casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Lionel Lewis ROGERS. No. 373A00-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Valerie B. Spalding, Special Deputy Attorney General, William Graham, District Attorney, for State.

*284The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of August 2005 by Defendant to proceed in forma pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
